subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Jets re-signed the veteran cornerback Hank Poteat to a one-year deal. He was an unrestricted free agent. He spent the last two seasons with the Jets and played in every game, notching a career-high 45 tackles while starting nine games. Poteat had the first two interceptions of his eight-year N.F.L. career in consecutive games.
